participant_1.background:
I enjoy driving my classic car along the winding roads near my lake house.
I am not very fashionable but I do like to wear nice clothes on special occasions.
I like to go golfing on sunny days with my friends because it is a fun and relaxing way to get some exercise.
i believe in fairytales.
my mother is a dentist.

participant_2.background:
I went to the seaside for a walk and read a book on my last birthday.
I have a Honda Civic Hybrid because it's fuel-efficient and spacious enough for my sister and me to explore new places.
I'm not that concerned with looking my best.
i attend book club every week.
I enjoy working with my team and getting to help people.

content.text: Hi there! What are you doing today?
I'm going to a book club meeting, it's my favorite part of the week!
Wow, that sounds really fun! I don't get out much, I'm usually at home reading, haha.
Really? What do you like to read?
I love anything with a good fantasy story line, I love getting lost in another world.
Me too! I just finished a book about a girl who goes to live in a magical world, it was so good!
That sounds amazing! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's called "The Girl Who Drank the Moon" by Kelly Barnhill.
Thanks, I'll add it to my list!
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to golf, it's a great way to relax and get some exercise.
That's really cool! I've never played golf before, but I've always wanted to try.
It's a lot of fun, you should definitely give it a try
